snippet: An explosive device struck near an Israeli Army patrol, in an attack seen as the most serious in recent weeks on Israel’s northern borders.
abstract: Explosive device is detonated against Israeli Army patrol along Israeli-Syrian cease-fire line in Golan Heights, and Israeli forces respond with artillery fire against Syrian military positions; attack is viewed in Israel as most serious in recent weeks because it was first to cause Israeli casualties, wounding four soldiers.
lead_paragraph: An explosive device struck near an Israeli Army patrol, in an attack seen as the most serious in recent weeks on Israel’s northern borders.

headline.main: Blast in Golan Heights Wounds 4 Israeli Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Blast in Golan Heights Wounds 4 Israeli Soldiers
